Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Leadership change in the Magistracy of Canopus ComStar, on behalf of the Canopian administrative etat, hereby informs the public of the Inner Sphere and relevant authorities that Emma Centrella has been appointed as the new Magestrix of the [[DM.Factions[faction_MagistracyOfCanopus],Magistracy Of Canopus]]. Earlier this week, the Canopian electorate ratified Emma Centrella as the 17th Magestrix of the Magistracy of Canopus. This change in leadership was prompted by the declining health of the previous Magestrix, Kyalla Centrella, which made it increasingly difficult for her to fulfill her duties.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Emma Centrella, despite being the daughter of the previous Magestrix, has largely stayed out of the media spotlight ever since the Andurien War ended. She is widely recognized as a war hero among Canopians, thanks to her service in the 2nd Canopian Cuirassiers, particularly during the action on New Roland. 

Her courageous actions during the rearguard fighting prevented the total destruction of Canopian forces by the CCAF during the retreat from New Roland.

The 17th Magestrix will face significant challenges ahead, as the nation continues to recover from a devastating war and a prolonged economic downturn that has lasted for years.


This has been the CNB May broadcast.
